REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1455 reute h f BC-TWO-JOIN-NASDAQ-NATIO 06-01 0040

TEXT.TITLE: TWO JOIN NASDAQ NATIONAL MARKET SYSTEM
TEXT.BODY: CSC Industries Inc <CPSL.O> and ENZON Inc <ENZN.O> said their common stocks will be added to the National Association of Securities Dealers' NASDAQ National Market System tomorrow. Reuter
